pokedex.name: Grookey
pokedex.desc: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.

pokedex.name: Thwackey
pokedex.desc: When it is drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.

pokedex.name: Rillaboom
pokedex.desc: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.

pokedex.name: Scorbunny
pokedex.desc: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it's raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.

pokedex.name: Raboot
pokedex.desc: It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.

pokedex.name: Cinderace
pokedex.desc: It juggles a pebble with its feet, turning it into a burning soccer ball. Its shots strike opponents hard and leave them scorched.

pokedex.name: Sobble
pokedex.desc: When scared, this Pokémon cries. Its tears pack the chemical punch of 100 onions, and attackers won't be able to resist weeping.

pokedex.name: Drizzile
pokedex.desc: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.

pokedex.name: Inteleon
pokedex.desc: It has many hidden capabilities, such as fingertips that can shoot water and a membrane on its back that it can use to glide through the air.

pokedex.name: Skwovet
pokedex.desc: Found throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon becomes uneasy if its cheeks are ever completely empty of berries.

pokedex.name: Greedent
pokedex.desc: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.

pokedex.name: Rookidee
pokedex.desc: It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.

pokedex.name: Corvisquire
pokedex.desc: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent's strength.

pokedex.name: Corviknight
pokedex.desc: This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the Galar region. The black luster of its steel body could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

pokedex.name: Blipbug
pokedex.desc: A constant collector of information, this Pokémon is very smart. Very strong is what it isn't.

pokedex.name: Dottler
pokedex.desc: It barely moves, but it's still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.

pokedex.name: Nickit
pokedex.desc: Aided by the soft pads on its feet, it silently raids the food stores of other Pokémon. It survives off its ill-gotten gains.

pokedex.name: Thievul
pokedex.desc: It secretly marks potential targets with a scent. By following the scent, it stalks its targets and steals from them when they least expect it.

pokedex.name: Gossifleur
pokedex.desc: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

pokedex.name: Eldegoss
pokedex.desc: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.

pokedex.name: Wooloo
pokedex.desc: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

pokedex.name: Dubwool
pokedex.desc: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

pokedex.name: Impidimp
pokedex.desc: It sneaks into people's homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.

pokedex.name: Morgrem
pokedex.desc: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it's trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.

pokedex.name: Grimmsnarl
pokedex.desc: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.

pokedex.name: Dreepy
pokedex.desc: After being reborn as a ghost Pokémon, Dreepy wanders the areas it used to inhabit back when it was alive in prehistoric seas.

pokedex.name: Drakloak
pokedex.desc: It's capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.

pokedex.name: Dragapult
pokedex.desc: When it isn't battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

pokedex.name: Mimikyu
pokedex.desc: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimikyu's old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.
